shortDesc: A music player app for easy music listening.
fullDesc:
This music player app supports local music list storage for offline playback, with multi-condition filtering by artist, genre, and name.

Built to solve common issues like lack of filtering in existing apps and playback interruptions from unstable networks.

Tech stack: Expo framework, SQLite local database, Node.js + Express.js backend for backups. Future plans include Google Drive integration for enhanced user experience.

hero.title: Music Player
hero.description: A cross-platform music management system designed to solve playback interruptions, complex filtering, and data backup pain points.

problem.title: Challenge
problem.desc: Existing players <highlight>lack advanced filtering</highlight> and music interrupts on unstable networks

solution.title: Solution
solution.desc: Developed offline-first architecture with SQLite database and resumable downloads

overview.focus: Database Migration, Playback State Machine, File System Management

motivation.title: Why Build This Project?
motivation.description: A cross-platform music system solving audio disconnection and tag filtering pain points.
keyQuestions: How to ensure filtering doesn't interrupt currently playing music?
How to safely perform SQLite database migrations?
How to handle resumable downloads for large files?

challenges.title: State Guarding - Filter Without Interruption
challenges.symptom: Music stops unexpectedly when filtering tags
challenges.rootCause: Filtering resets the playlist, causing current playback state to be lost
challenges.impact: User experience interrupted, need to reselect song

details: Use !player.playing logic to only reset list when not playing
When playing, only update view without touching playback queue
solution.result: Music continues playing during tag filtering, smooth UX

challenges.title: SQLite Migration - Version Control
challenges.symptom: App updates with schema changes may cause crashes
challenges.rootCause: Lack of version control mechanism to track database schema changes
challenges.impact: Users may lose data or experience crashes after upgrade

details: Use PRAGMA user_version to track database version
Check version number on app startup
Execute corresponding migration scripts based on version diff
solution.result: Supports smooth database upgrades, user data preserved

challenges.title: Download Resumable - Large File Transfer
challenges.symptom: Downloads fail on unstable networks and must restart
challenges.rootCause: Native download API doesn't support resume

details: Implement download progress tracking and state storage
solution.result: Large file downloads are stable and reliable with resume support
